last_episode_to_air.name: The Light Between Lives
last_episode_to_air.overview: Nancy and the Drew Crew’s mission to save Horseshoe Bay from sins of its past comes to an epic conclusion as they must contend with Nancy’s most shocking discovery yet, one that will determine the fate of her star-crossed love with Ace.

name: Nancy Drew
overview: Nancy Drew makes plans to leave her hometown for college, but finds herself drawn into a supernatural murder mystery instead.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: Season four begins as Nancy launches a new investigation to find a group of missing bodies from Horseshoe Bay's cemetery that have been dug up and stolen—or have possibly risen. As Nancy is drawn into this ghostly case, a string of unexplained paranormal crimes leads the Drew Crew to believe that the literal sins of the town's past have returned to haunt the living.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: An 18-year-old Nancy Drew makes plans to leave her hometown for college after high school graduation, but finds herself drawn into a supernatural murder mystery.

episodes.name: The Secret of the Old Morgue
episodes.overview: When Nancy learns that Tiffany Hudson's corpse is being moved out of Horseshoe Bay for a private autopsy, she puts her investigation into Lucy Sable's dress on hold to pull off one of her most risky missions yet.

episodes.name: The Curse of the Dark Storm
episodes.overview: When a nor’easter hits Horseshoe Bay, Ace warns everyone that the storm has been known to blow restless spirits ashore. Meanwhile, Nancy confronts Nick about the secrets he’s been keeping.

episodes.name: The Haunted Ring
episodes.overview: As the funeral for Tiffany Hudson nears, her confused spirit seemingly haunts Horseshoe Bay. Nancy invites Bess to stay with her, allowing Nancy to figure out what Bess is hiding. Nick struggles with what he learned about Tiffany.

episodes.name: The Case of the Wayward Spirit
episodes.overview: When Nancy realizes that George is possessed by Tiffany's spirit, she must act quickly to rid her friend of the ghostly passenger before it's too late. A mysterious stranger wanders in to The Claw and asks the gang to cater a charity gala.

episodes.name: The Mystery of Blackwood Lodge
episodes.overview: While trying to uncover the truth about a long-buried history between Lucy Sable and Ryan Hudson, Nancy finds herself in the curious position of having to strike a deal with Horseshoe Bay’s newest and most suspect widower.

episodes.name: The Tale of the Fallen Sea Queen
episodes.overview: The gang resolves to find a way to speak with the only eyewitness to Lucy and Tiffany's murders -- Lucy herself. Nancy is faced with a truth that seems to validate her greatest fear.

episodes.name: The Path Of Shadows
episodes.overview: Nancy and the Drew Crew discover that the car wreck that left one of their own at death's door was no accident. While simultaneously hoping to solve the crime, the crew investigates the physical evidence of sabotage to the car and take a supernatural detour into the metaphysical world.

episodes.name: The Hidden Staircase
episodes.overview: In our winter finale, Nancy and the Drew Crew desperately search for George’s missing sister, Ted, whose kidnapping eerily mirrors the investigation that started Nancy’s sleuthing career. Meanwhile, while revisiting the trauma of her past, as a means to solving the present-day mystery, Nancy finally reconnects with her father just as an escalation in the Lucy Sable investigation threatens to separate them forever.

episodes.name: The Mark of the Poisoner’s Pearl
episodes.overview: After discovering a connection between the poison that killed Tiffany Hudson and a Horseshoe Bay cold case, Nancy and the Drew Crew risk their lives to bring a serial killer to justice.

episodes.name: The Phantom of Bonny Scot
episodes.overview: When Nancy’s quest to clear Carson’s name clashes with Owen’s pursuit of justice for the victims of the Bonny Scot, she’ll have to decide just how far she’s willing to go to get her dad out of jail.

episodes.name: The Lady of Larkspur Lane
episodes.overview: While Nancy and the Drew Crew follow up on the latest Lucy Sable lead, they also work to uncover who tried to kill Ryan, leading them to a startling revelation.

episodes.name: The Whisper Box
episodes.overview: When Nancy finds herself stuck in an alternate reality the Drew Crew desperately searches for a way to bring her back.

episodes.name: The Sign of the Uninvited Guest
episodes.overview: Nancy and the Drew Crew follow the latest Lucy Sable murder lead, while simultaneously working to uncover the attempted murder of someone in their community. When both investigations lead back to the same person, Nancy and Nick confront the suspect with their findings.

episodes.name: The Terror of Horseshoe Bay
episodes.overview: With time running out before Carson’s evidentiary hearing, Nancy turns to supernatural sources in a last-ditch effort to find clues to exonerate her father.

episodes.name: The Haunting of Nancy Drew
episodes.overview: While using a combination of forensic clues, skilled observation and relentless questioning of those who knew Lucy at the end of her life, Nancy unravels what happened the night Lucy died. While her detective work succeeds in some ways, it also reveals a devasting truth.

episodes.name: The Girl in the Locket
episodes.overview: With only hours left, the Drew Crew must race against the clock to find a way to vanquish the Agleaca before she takes what is owed to her.

episodes.name: The Clue in the Captain's Painting
episodes.overview: Nancy and the Drew Crew investigate a mysterious death which also leads to new details regarding the Aglaeca curse.  Spring finale.

episodes.name: The Search for the Midnight Wraith
episodes.overview: Nancy and her friends realize they need to come up with a plan to stop the Aglaeca before it's too late; Detective Tamura shows up at The Claw to bring Nancy in for questioning in a mysterious comatose girl's assault.

episodes.name: The Reunion of Lost Souls
episodes.overview: Nancy and the Drew Crew continue to search for clues to battle the Aglaeca. George has an unfortunate first encounter with Nick's visiting mother. Carson and Ace have a heart-to-heart.

episodes.name: The Secret of Solitary Scribe
episodes.overview: With time running out, Nancy and her friends come up with a plan that they think might help reverse the curse that the Aglaeca placed on them.

episodes.name: The Fate of the Buried Treasure
episodes.overview: Nancy and the Drew Crew race against the clock to find a way to destroy the Aglaeca before she can destroy them. Ace reaches out to Carson for a favor.

episodes.name: The Drowned Woman
episodes.overview: Tensions flare between Nancy and the Drew Crew as they continue to fight the Aglaeca. Bess makes a mistake that could cause all of them their lives. George has a beautiful bonding moment with her sisters.

episodes.name: The Riddle of the Broken Doll
episodes.overview: Nancy and the Drew Crew learn that they have a new battle on their hands. George's strange behavior leaves Nick feeling unsettled. Carson makes Nancy an offer she can't refuse.

episodes.name: The Legend of the Murder Hotel
episodes.overview: Nancy is approached by a group of young girls asking for help in finding a volleyball teammate they believe was kidnapped by a ghost. Meanwhile, Ace and Amanda share a moment.

episodes.name: The Quest for the Spider Sapphire
episodes.overview: Nancy and George work together to vanish the ghost who’s been timesharing George’s body since they defeated the Aglaeca. Meanwhile, no one is more surprised than Bess when a blast from her past comes knocking.

episodes.name: The Bargain of the Blood Shroud
episodes.overview: Nancy and the Drew Crew strike a deal with Gil Bobbsey.

episodes.name: The Spell of the Burning Bride
episodes.overview: Nancy picks up a new investigating job involving the local florist and is pleasantly surprised when Gil Bobbsey is able to offer some assistance. Meanwhile, Ace receives a cryptic text message.

episodes.name: The Scourge of the Forgotten Rune
episodes.overview: Nancy and the Drew Crew work together to help one of their own. Meanwhile, Ryan has an interesting conversation with Celia.

episodes.name: The Trail of the Missing Witness
episodes.overview: Nancy and Celia Hudson go head to head. Meanwhile, Nick hires a new line cook at The Claw.

episodes.name: The Beacon of Moonstone Island
episodes.overview: Gil insists on helping Nancy investigate a hunch on Moonstone Island, but Ace and Amanda are forced to step in when he is unable to be there for her. Meanwhile, Nick begins questioning Nancy's loyalty. Lastly, Odette is getting on George's last nerve.

episodes.name: The Siege of the Unseen Specter
episodes.overview: Nancy's birthday dinner with Carson is cut short when Detective Tamura shows up with a warrant to arrest her for contempt of court. Meanwhile, George, Bess and Ace work together to summon up one of their ancestors to help locate Odette's Englishwoman lover Mary's soul amongst billions in the spirit world.

episodes.name: The Celestial Visitor
episodes.overview: As things begin to go haywire at The Claw, a striking stranger appears looking for Nancy, and announces himself as the billionaire Tom Swift. Meanwhile, Ace has issues with the way Nancy insists on handling things with Celia.

episodes.name: The Purloined Keys
episodes.overview: Ryan and the Drew Crew work together to find a way to bring down Everett. Meanwhile, Carson gives Nancy a word of warning.

episodes.name: The Judgement of the Perilous Captive
episodes.overview: Nancy finally has Everett exactly where she wants him. Meanwhile, Nick receives upsetting news from one of his tenants, Jake Cazine, about the youth center he wants to open. Lastly, Carson shares something disturbing with Bess.

episodes.name: The Echo of Lost Tears
episodes.overview: Carson, Ryan and the Drew Crew work together to help Nancy.

episodes.name: The Warming of a Frozen Heart
episodes.overview: On the evening of Horseshoe Bay’s annual Harvest Carnival, the body of a mysterious young man is discovered on the Hudson carnival grounds. The Drew Crew is drawn into the case by a host of confounding clues surrounding a new menace terrorizing the town – a killer who has an enigmatic connection to none other than Nancy’s newest foil: Temperance Hudson.

episodes.name: The Journey of the Dangerous Mind
episodes.overview: As the gang investigates the Frozen Heart murders, sparks fly between Nancy and her counterpart in law enforcement on Nancy's first day as the community liaison. Temperance makes a startling offer at the police station.

episodes.name: The Testimony of the Executed Man
episodes.overview: On the trail of the Frozen Hearts Killer, Nancy and her friends follow a surprising lead from a podcaster at an annual convention for amateur sleuths, where they also find themselves unraveling ghostly clues about a homicide from the 1950s.

episodes.name: The Demon of Piper Beach
episodes.overview: Sleepwalking suddenly spikes in town and Nancy questions whether Frozen Heart murders has been solved.

episodes.name: The Vision of the Birchwood Prisoner
episodes.overview: After a major setback in the Frozen Hearts case, Nancy asks Temperance for help with an occult approach to getting answers from a murder suspect. Meanwhile, the Bobbsey entanglement creates a world of trouble for Ace, and George has a long-overdue confrontation with someone from her past.

episodes.name: The Myth of the Ensnared Hunter
episodes.overview: The Drew Crew goes on the hunt for an underground prison that may hold answers to the Frozen Hearts killings – all while following a lead on a relic that could cure George of the paranormal affliction that’s shortening her lifespan. Ace tries to enlist Amanda Bobbsey in bringing her father to justice.

episodes.name: The Gambit of the Tangled Souls
episodes.overview: While Nancy and her friends race to find the relic that could finally untangle George’s soul from Odette Lamar’s, Carson and Ryan are affected by a mystical substance that prompts a temporary return to the lowered inhibitions of adolescence.

episodes.name: The Burning of the Sorrows
episodes.overview: Nancy, Bess, Agent Park and Temperance have to join forces when an attempt to trap a killer ends up unintentionally unleashing a deadly supernatural entity that feeds on people’s sorrows. Meanwhile, Ace and Ryan discover a haunting at the Historical Society, and George meets a friend from Nick’s past who may have secrets of her own.

episodes.name: The Voices in the Frost
episodes.overview: Nick, George and Bess unravel the truth behind a college student's mysterious death, while unexpected obstacles prevent Ace from working with Nancy and Agent Park as they grow closer and investigate the hidden origin of the Frozen Hearts Killer.

episodes.name: The Confession of the Long Night
episodes.overview: A truth-inducing ritual takes hold of a town-wide cocktail party, yielding volcanic emotional confessions and a surprising romantic connection for Nancy.

episodes.name: The Spellbound Juror
episodes.overview: While serving on a jury, Nick realizes that one of his fellow jurors may be the next target of the Frozen Hearts Killer.

episodes.name: The Witch Tree Symbol
episodes.overview: Nancy searches for a missing person targeted by Temperance, who has also placed a fatal hex on the kids of the Youth Center. With the solution to the Frozen Hearts mystery almost in their grasp, a shocking reversal puts the Drew Crew in the crosshairs.

episodes.name: The Ransom of the Forsaken Soul
episodes.overview: The fate of Horseshoe Bay rests in the hands of the Drew Crew, who must find a way to defeat their most powerful nemesis yet. Lives and hearts are in supernatural jeopardy - and a star-crossed choice will change everything, forever.

episodes.name: The Dilemma of the Lover's Curse
episodes.overview: Nancy launches a new investigation to find a group of missing bodies from Horseshoe Bay's cemetery that have been dug up and stolen – or have possibly risen. As Nancy is drawn into this ghostly case, a string of unexplained paranormal crimes leads the Drew Crew to believe that the literal sins of the town's past have returned to haunt the living. Meanwhile, Nancy struggles with yearning for Ace, the man she loves. But when a slow-burning attraction begins between Nancy and the son of Ryan Hudson's newest enemy, Nancy must decide whether this love interest is worth the ire of both her father and Ace – whose own heart may be tempted by a new relationship too.

episodes.name: The Maiden's Rage
episodes.overview: Ace senses that Nancy is holding back and presses her to give him more information about the curse. Meanwhile, Bess is determined to prepare the perfect meal for Addy’s parents, and Nick schedules a brunch date with someone new. Lastly, George’s plan to let Judge Abbot know how grateful she is for the opportunity to be his clerk takes a shocking turn.

episodes.name: The Danger of the Hopeful Sigil
episodes.overview: Nancy and Ace share a sweet moment while working together to find a way to break the curse. Meanwhile, Carson and Jean continue growing closer, but a recent conversation leaves him with an unsettled feeling. Lastly, Jesse and Birdie devise a plan to teach the school bully a lesson.

episodes.name: The Return of the Killer's Hook
episodes.overview: Nancy runs into an old friend who is in town directing a remake of a horror film called “Longhook,” where strange things are happening on set. She’s hoping that solving a new case will help get her out of her funk, and a worried Ryan offers to help Nancy since he is a self-proclaimed expert on the original version of the film. Meanwhile, Ace helps Bess rehearse for her role as Victim #1 in the movie. Lastly, George and Nick discover that they were both stood up for meetings by councilwoman, Brie, which gives them both an uneasy feeling.

episodes.name: The Oracle of the Whispering Remains
episodes.overview: The Drew Crew discover a clue in an unexpected place and call in someone from George’s past to help find answers.

episodes.name: The Web of Yesterdays
episodes.overview: Nancy and the Drew Crew work together to identify a creature. Meanwhile, Bess reaches out to Carson after receiving a cease-and-desist letter. Lastly, Tristan ends up stealing Nancy’s thunder during Career Day at the high school.

episodes.name: The Reaping of Hollow Oak
episodes.overview: Nancy and Ace each show up at Nick’s loft interrupting his brunch date with and Jade. Their behavior leads Jade to wonder if Nick might be up to something shady. Meanwhile, Carson and George help Bess prep for her statement.

episodes.name: The Crooked Banister
episodes.overview: Nancy sends a group text to the Drew Crew asking them to meet her at The Claw ASAP. Meanwhile, Ace’s dad tries to get him to open up about Nancy. Lastly, Carson makes plans with Nancy to mark the one-year anniversary of losing her mom.

episodes.name: The Memory of the Stolen Soul
episodes.overview: Nancy and the Drew Crew prepare to battle a Sin Eater.

episodes.name: The Ballad of Lives Foregone
episodes.overview: Carson and Ryan work together to help Nancy.

episodes.name: The Sinner's Sacrifice
episodes.overview: Ryan shows up just in the nick of time to help Nancy. Meanwhile, Nick is thrown by a statement George makes. Lastly, Bess is left feeling concerned after speaking with Ace.

episodes.name: The Heartbreak of Truth
episodes.overview: Nancy and the Drew Crew head out to the graveyard after she receives a mysterious call.

episodes.name: The Light Between Lives
episodes.overview: Nancy and the Drew Crew’s mission to save Horseshoe Bay from sins of its past comes to an epic conclusion as they must contend with Nancy’s most shocking discovery yet, one that will determine the fate of her star-crossed love with Ace.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: Season four begins as Nancy launches a new investigation to find a group of missing bodies from Horseshoe Bay's cemetery that have been dug up and stolen—or have possibly risen. As Nancy is drawn into this ghostly case, a string of unexplained paranormal crimes leads the Drew Crew to believe that the literal sins of the town's past have returned to haunt the living.
